#summary BlueCove can be found in maven Central Repository.

= BlueCove can be found in maven Central Repository =

 http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/net/sf/bluecove/bluecove/
 and
 http://mirrors.ibiblio.org/pub/mirrors/maven2/net/sf/bluecove/bluecove/

 To use BlueCove in your maven2 project you need to add this to your pom.xml:

{{{
            <dependency>
                <groupId>net.sf.bluecove</groupId>
                <artifactId>bluecove</artifactId>
               <version>1.2.1</version>
            </dependency>
}}}
